title: Sell Old Forester Birthday Bourbon
metaTitle: Sell Old Forester Birthday Bourbon | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Old Forester Birthday Bourbon. We buy all vintages from 2002 to present. Direct offers and fast payment.
heroSubhead: We buy every vintage of Birthday Bourbon directly from collectors.
introParagraph: Old Forester Birthday Bourbon is one of the most collectible annual releases in the bourbon world. Released every September 2nd, each vintage is unique. We purchase all years of Birthday Bourbon, from the inaugural 2002 release to the current vintage. Sell your bottle directly for a fair market offer.
whatWeBuy: Old Forester Single Barrel Barrel Strength
whatWeDoNotBuy: Old Forester 1870, 1897, 1910, 1920 (unless part of a large collection)
photoChecklist: Front label clearly showing the vintage year
Seal condition (the wax or foil seal is critical)
Neck tag or hang tag if present
conditionFactors: Vintage year is the primary value driver
Seal condition is crucial; cracked wax can lower value
Fill level should be consistent with the vintage
Label clarity and absence of stains
pricingFactors: Vintage year (older vintages like 2002-2010 are significantly more valuable)
Current market demand for specific ABV/batches
Condition of the unique bottle shape and seal
Presence of hang tags on applicable years

faqs.question: Which Birthday Bourbon years are most valuable?
faqs.answer: Generally, the earliest releases (2002-2008) are the most valuable due to their scarcity. However, all vintages command a premium.

faqs.question: My seal has a hairline crack, is that okay?
faqs.answer: Wax seals often develop hairline cracks. We still buy them, but please include a close-up photo so we can assess if the seal integrity is compromised.

faqs.question: Do you buy the 117 Series?
faqs.answer: Yes, we purchase the Old Forester 117 Series releases in addition to Birthday Bourbon.

faqs.question: Do you buy President's Choice?
faqs.answer: Yes, Old Forester President's Choice single barrels are highly desirable and we actively purchase them.

faqs.question: How do I ship the unique bottle shape?
faqs.answer: The decanter-style bottle requires careful packing. We recommend wrapping the neck and base separately and using a large enough box with plenty of padding.

faqs.question: Do you buy Old Forester Single Barrel Barrel Strength?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy the Barrel Strength Single Barrel store picks and standard releases.
